s = input()
t = input()

sticky = []
for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        sticky.append(s[i])

print("".join(set(sticky)))

s = input()
t = input()

sticky = []

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        sticky.append(s[i])

print("".join(sticky))

s = input()
t = input()

result = ""

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        result += s[i]

print(result)

def main():
    s = input()
    t = input()
    i = 0
    ans = ''
    while i < len(s):
        if s[i] == t[i*2]:
            ans += s[i]
        i += 1
    print(ans)

main()
